Name: Add columns to Network table
Description: Can I add custom header columns to the Network requests table?

Notes: 1. In the **Network** panel, right click on the column headers > Response Headers > Manage Header Columns.
2. In the **Manage Header Columns** popup window, click "Add Custom Header". Enter the custom header name, and click **Add** to add a new column to the Network requests table.
